reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cashmere sweater soft and gentle on the skin, with excellent fit and quality. They describe it as beautiful, comfortable, and appreciate its color, with one customer noting its soft blue shade. Customers consider it good value for money.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size, soft and beautiful
items.body: I bought this sweater for myself. The value for the product is good and I like the fit. I highly recommend this product and seller. Read more
items.author: Connie Davis-Hart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater
items.body: Very soft and beautiful. I really like this sweater. Read more
items.author: Katie N.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Retired
items.body: Beautiful sweater. Fits like a very expensive sweater, maybe 300 dollars at Nordstrom. I can't believe the quality. Would like more colors. Would recommend this sweater. Read more
items.author: Retired

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cashmere sweater.
items.body: This shirt is so soft. I need to buy some more of them. Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Wardrobe Staple
items.body: I bought this same sweater a couple of years ago and love that it’s still available. (My first one was eaten by moths) .. I like to wear this in the fall and in the winter with a blue striped button down underneath.. super cute.. with a pair of black pants and boots, leather jacket .. it’s one of my favorite outfits! I got a size large because I’m wearing a shirt underneath it .. I normally wear a Medium. I’m 5’4” 145lbs. It’s relatively light weight and doesn’t pill. Read more
items.author: Gwendolyn

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unhappy
items.body: SO itchy! I don't believe what I received is actually 100% cashmere. Did I get the same product as the rest of you? It was a lovely color and had a beautiful drape, but I couldn't wait to get it off from the moment I tried it on. Also, "free returns" isn't accurate. Seller deducted money from my refund. Not cool! Read more
items.author: CK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: The blue color is a dusty baby blue. It is soft and comfortable. I typically wear a size 8. I am 5’9 154. This company suggested a large and it is a great fit. Love it! Read more
items.author: Lisa F

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Undyed White, Bella Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
